code: import{LOGIN_USER,LOGIN_SUCCESS,LOGOUT_USER,LOGOUT_USER_SUCCESS,API_ERROR,SOCIAL_LOGIN}from"./actionTypes";export var loginUser=function loginUser(user,history){return{type:LOGIN_USER,payload:{user:user,history:history}};};export var loginSuccess=function loginSuccess(user){return{type:LOGIN_SUCCESS,payload:user};};export var logoutUser=function logoutUser(history){return{type:LOGOUT_USER,payload:{history:history}};};export var logoutUserSuccess=function logoutUserSuccess(){return{type:LOGOUT_USER_SUCCESS,payload:{}};};export var apiError=function apiError(error){return{type:API_ERROR,payload:error};};export var socialLogin=function socialLogin(data,history,type){return{type:SOCIAL_LOGIN,payload:{data:data,history:history,type:type}};};
